name: Salaun
description:
Description

Salaun is a third person narrative game in which you will live the story of a young Breton who has finished his studies.

Your mission is to interact with the characters and discover this little game. Chat with NPCs and learn about Salaun's story!

This game is graphically inspired by the famous "Unturned" game. Salaun is also my first game.

Salaun wakes up the morning of graduation to guide you to his future adult life!

The goal is to discover the story of Salaun, to have fun and try a little game a little different from his habits!

Features:

● Cubic / Low Poly! Play with a graphic look close to Unturned

● Dialogue! A lot of dialogue to facilitate immersion

● Search! Find the characters to talk to in order to advance in the story!

You can also follow me on several other platforms(just Discord for the moment).

  • Discord
